divs: sighting detailsthis is an account of a ufo sighting that i had in approx. mid june of 1986. the time and date are not exact as this occured over 20+ years ago and i am going from memory. i was in jackson county michigan,traveling east on ann arbor rd. at around 10 pm est. in the summer or 1986. i notice an object in the night sky.it appeared to be a cluster of small red lights that seemed to be hovering or traveling west,in the distance to the east.it didn't look normal,so i decided to see if i could get a better look.i proceeded down the road about 1\3 to 1\2 of a mile. i continued to view the object as i traveled east on ann arbor rd.i finally came to where ann arbor rd.ended and the highway on-ramp to enter (i-94 east) started. there was a fork in the road near the highway on-ramp and where a road,(knight rd.)merged. there was a small turn-out there.i turned right and i parked in the turn out area.i exited and stepped away from my vehicle,continuing to view the object. the object was spherical in shape and black or dark in apperance,nearly blending against the night sky.it had what looked to be multiple, maybe 20 red lights spaced evenly across it's surface.if it hadn't been for the lights i probably wouldnt have noticed it at all.it's elevation was approx.500 ft.and it's distance was approx. 1\4 mile away.it travled slowly from east to west in a straight line.it seemed to almost paralell the highway on it's course.i dont remember the object having any particular noise,but there was a faint humming sound.the sound could easily have been from the vehicles traveling on the highway, as it was much closer than the object.i continued to view the object until it faded in the distance to the west. the object never changed in it's course,speed or apperance during my observation.it just seemed to be out for a cruise. i have never before or since saw anything resembling this object. i have attached recent,(may 2010) daylight pictures of the area where the sighting occured just for general reference.
trends: There have been 10 other sightings in Jackson
There were no other sightings in Jackson on or around June 20th 1986
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: the object appeared as spherical and solid with many small red type lights
